gemini_config.system_instruction: Create a compelling data-driven section showing the impact of [project name]: downloads, users helped, issues resolved, and community growth statistics.

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""Create a compelling data-driven section showing the impact of [project name]: downloads, users helpe..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
